data.actual_result: The message says "Noahkiq changed the channel name:"
data.expected_result: The message saying the name was changed says something like "Noahkiq reset the channel name."
data.short_description: Changing the name of a group DM to the default name shows the group DM name change message, but without the new name
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a group DM - Change the name (but leave it blank to make it the defaut name
